original_text: The brothers immediately sent Paul and Silas away by night to Berea, and when they arrived they went into the Jewish synagogue.
korean_text: 밤에 형제들이 곧 바울과 실라를 베뢰아로 보내니 그들이 이르러 유대인의 회당에 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: The brothers immediately sent Paul and Silas away
they went into the Jewish synagogue
